Name: Cube Defense
About the game: You left alone camping in the mountains ... But during this time a virus has invaded the country and a cubic horde is heading towards you! Arm yourself and overcome waves of enemies. Fill up with arms and ammunition between each wave. How much cubic wave can you eliminate? Features : ■ 2 maps! ■ More than 30 levels! ■ 5 different weapons! ■ Shop system in game! ■ Addictive! ■ Low Poly decors! ■ Relaxing gameplay!
